content.webTitle: Pick of the Week: London: Dance

fields.headline: Pick of the Week: Dance
fields.bodyText: The Royal Ballet: Giselle Royal Opera House, WC2, Tue, Thu, Fri 28, 30 Apr, 1 May Peter Wright's beautifully nuanced staging of this gem of 19th-century Romanticism. Shobana Jeyasingh: Just Add Water? Linbury Studio Theatre At Royal Opera House, WC2, Fri 1 May Jeyasingh and her dancers celebrate the cuisine of multicultural Britain. Focus On Forsythe London Coliseum, WC2, Sat, Sun 25-26 Apr; Sadler's Wells, EC1, Sat, Sun 25-26 Apr; Tate Modern, SE1, Thu Apr 30, Fri 1 May; Midland Goods Shed, N1, Fri 1 May Multimedia dance manipulating images of the city. The Many Faces Of Buddhism: A Day Of Rare Buddhist Dance Victoria & Albert Museum, SW7, Fri 1 May Sacred dances from the Buddhist traditions of India, Japan, Nepal and Sri Lanka. Protein Dance Company: Dear Body Queen Elizabeth Hall, SE1, Tue, Wed 28-29 Apr The cult of the body beautiful under the comic scrutiny of Luca Silvestrini.
